product_name: SaltStick Plus Electrolyte Salt Capsules - 100 Capsules
long_description: Keep your electrolyte levels balanced and your energy level high with SaltStick Plus Electrolyte salt capsules. They contain the electrolytes you lose during activity, and they include caffeine.
short_description: Keep your electrolyte levels balanced and your energy level high with SaltStick Plus Electrolyte salt capsules. They contain the electrolytes you lose during activity, and they include caffeine.
